DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare ketogenic effect coconut oil three MCT oil ( 60-40 , tricaprylin triheptanoate ) production ketone healthy adult . Each oil evaluate individually combination 8h-period repeat blood sample perform .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Ketogenic Effect Coconut Oil Different MCTs
DOC.detailed_description: The study compose eight successive visit . Each visit consist consumption one individual oil mixture oil ( 20 g coconut oil 10 g coconut oil + 10 g MCT 60-40 20 g MCT 60-40 10 g coconut oil + 10 g tricaprylin 20 g tricaprylin 10 g coconut oil + 10 g triheptanoate 20 g triheptanoate ) 8h follow-up repeat blood sample take laboratory analysis ( plasma beta-hydroxybutyrate , acetoacetate , glucose , free fatty acid , triglyceride , total cholesterol , lactate insulin ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult 18 old . Fasting plasma glucose â‰¥7.0 mM ( diabetic prediabetics ) ; Smoking Clinicallysignificant gastrointestinal disease/conditions . Clinicallysignificant liver disease/dysfunction . Clinicallysignificant cardiac disease/conditions . Clinicallysignificant abnormal coagulation . Taking medication could affect lipid glucose metabolism Hypertension Pregnancy breastfeed Exercising 3 time week
